attributes.action: encourage the relevant local authorities to remove the offensive bust of the convicted terrorist Nelson Mandela from outside the Royal Festival Hall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nelson Mandela was convicted of terrorist offences in South Africa in 1964 and sentenced to life prisonment. At a time when the western world is engaged in a War against Terrorism, and our troops are being killed daily in the fight against international terrorism in Iraq and Afghanistan, it is highly offensive in the extreme that a bust "honouring" this terrorist
leader should be allowed to remain in London. The Prime Minister should use his influence to have it removed
immediately and replaced by a memorial honouring the victims of international terrorism and those who risk their lives combating this evil.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
